review:
very touching movie..i don't understand how this movie turned to be a flop. should have ideally been a blockbuster.
how will you feel if your life's work for which you have dreamed since you know the world and have worked passionately towards it everyday and have sacrificed every pleasure in your life to get it but just as your in touching distance from your dream it gets stolen away that too by your close friend in front of your eyes and you can't do anything ? won't you feel suffocated ? cheated ? unfair world ?
this movie follows this plot. ajay devgan has given a master class performance. salman is good too but ajay is well beyond anyone else. this will always be one of my fav movies, no matter the critics or others say.
must watch if you love a well developed story arch characters with a great emotional value.
